name: The Treasure hunter (J_Misterio1)
description:
This game is about a warrior trap in a fantasy world. In this world, there are some golden objects considered as treasures and very valuable objects but no one has been able to collect those objects and escape the world. for the game to be completed, the player must collect at least 50 objects and kill the boss.

There are two levels of the game to be completed and is based on an open landscape. In the first level, the player needs to survive the creatures and collect the objects to move to the next level where the boss must be defeated. 

CONTROLS 

WASD or Arrow.

W: forward 

A: left 

S: Back

D: right 

SPACE BAR: allow the player to jump.

MOUSE: left button to aim, Right to shoot

R: reload the player weapon when out of bullets 

Developed by: Jesus Miguel RP
